lenders.name: New
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is the correct thing to do in this world
lenders.occupational_info: New Wind Free Church........... There is a new wind in the world.......... Sadly there is a lack of mankind helping his fellow man......... The New wind is a movement to understand each other, be tolerant to other’s differences and to help the Fellow man..... We are created in our Gods Image. This idea is found in most of the Worlds Religions. ................ We all have an internal spark, Soul, chee, it goes by many names. .............. This idea is actually physically measured. Scientists have found in studies when one dies a very slight physical weight loss is detected. Is this the physical aspect of the soul leaving? Does it matter? Faith and good deeds are what matters. To nourish that spark we feel there is a need to have faith, be honest, kind and assist others where we can. ................ ............It’s how your God views your deeds and actions in the physical world that counts................... ..............A common thread found in most Religions through out the word is ‘Do the Right Thing by others’. What is the right thing? . A wise man said “if you have to think on if it’s the correct thing to do usually is not........... New Wind Free Church is a virtual Church where its members can commune with one another while seeking to do the right thing in our world and help others. That is the New Wind.................. Free means we are free of Government involvement. We seek no assistance from Government. Yet our Members are willing to assist others as they can when Government can not, will not or should not..................... We are open to all faiths who wish to do good in the name of there God, Goddess or Supreme Being..................................................................... "What is Serving God?’Tis doing Good to Man” Poor Richard "Well done is better than well said." Poor Richard 1737

lenders.loan_because: it is part of my purpose to be a global citizen and serve however I can.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for an international hunger relief organization called Stop Hunger Now.  Our organization coordinates the distribution of food and other life-saving aid around the world. The organization is driven by a vision to end world hunger in our lifetime and a mission to provide food and life-saving aid to the world’s most destitute and hungry.  

As the director of development it is my job to raise funds to support our mission and cause.  I work with philanthropists and volunteers to further our cause.  

I also serve as a youth leader on international mission trips to Nicaragua.  I enjoy working with young people and seeing God work in their lives.

lenders.occupational_info: I run a website called Redcliffe Online, to further promote our local community and entrepreneurs here.  I also build websites with WordPress.

lenders.name: Draagbij
lenders.loan_because: with our little help we let people around the world take a big step forward
lenders.occupational_info: A small organisation started with selling shirts on the web to contribute to Kiva.org

lenders.name: workroom
lenders.loan_because: ...I can
lenders.occupational_info: I make interactive educational games and websites. PBS and Scholastic are two of my main clients.

lenders.name: Geir
lenders.loan_because: Its nice to be able to help someone

lenders.name: Lorena
lenders.loan_because: Because I love to help people create their own business!
lenders.occupational_info: I draw internet stuff

lenders.name: Kathryn Olagbemiro
lenders.loan_because: It is so important in this life to share what we have, and to give each other a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for the sick and the dying.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: Best way to help is to help people help themselves!

lenders.name: dee
lenders.loan_because: I've borrowed.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help others who need help.Financial stress is difficult. Helping others will help the circle of giving and receiving.
lenders.occupational_info: Healing people through exercise and mindful breathing and a healthy balance in outlook and faith.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Because I have so much in my life!

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I feel personally rewarded by being involved in the KIVA micro-credit program as this is one opportunity provided to me to share what I have been given. To assist new entrepreneurs in the developing countries around the globe to improve their lives and to achieve their ambitions is a privilege. The borrowers, through their own drive and ambition, will contribute to a better world for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: During my career, I have been involved in commercial lending, mortgage lending, economic development, regional development and investment attraction.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because:
other people probably have better ideas on how to spend my money than i do. clearly that means i have too much?
perhaps just unimaginative...
lenders.occupational_info:
i sail yachts for rich people. 
it doesnt get much more frivolous than that, right?

lenders.name: Tor Eivind
lenders.loan_because: I have a few to spend.
lenders.occupational_info: making computersystems that it based on the end users and make the technology become something that anyone can use..not only the few..

lenders.name: Garth & Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is the most effective and efficient way of helping people...very little administration expenses.

lenders.name: jalen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer a lot, working with programs that allow companies to perform professional development questionnaires.

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: investing in people makes sense to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I research what happens in the brain as we age. Identifying how age affects brain cells is the first step toward preventing those changes which contribute to age-related cognitive decline and brain diseases like Alzheimer's.

lenders.name: Anke&Thomas
lenders.loan_because: It´s only a drop in a bucket, but it´s water!

lenders.name: Praveen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help
lenders.occupational_info: Business Strategy

lenders.name: Nat
lenders.loan_because: I feel like I'm making someone's life just a little easier.

lenders.name: Let
lenders.loan_because: As a community, It's the least we can do for our friends in need, maybe someday someone will do it for us :)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional body piercer and a freelance graphic designer.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: The power of positive ripple effects is strong.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach ethics and psychology at a medical school.

lenders.loan_because: It may make a big difference to someone

lenders.loan_because: it's exciting to see a small amount of money make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help develop computer systems for a hospital.
